com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring
Class TemplateProbe

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring.Probe
      com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring.TemplateProbe
All Implemented Interfaces:
Identifiable, java.lang.Comparable
public class TemplateProbe
extends Probe

TemplateProbe - subclass of ServerProbe that includes ServerProbe Suite functionality. All Probes of ProbeType == 'suite' are instantiated as this class.

addServerProbe

public void addServerProbe(ServerProbe probeIn)
Add a new standard ServerProbe to this TemplateProbe. The passed in ServerProbe should be associated with a Server and SatCluster, IOTW, a standard probe.

Parameters:
probeIn - ServerProbe we want to add
